document_data.caption: A map showing the North Tesh Gate in southeast Zhentil Keep.
document_data.name: North Tesh Gate
document_data.mainbody: The '''North Tesh Gate''' was the southeastern entry point into the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The North Tesh Gate sat on the northern side of the [[Tesh Bridge]] that spanned the [[River Tesh]] where it met the [[Moonsea (lake)|Moonsea]].
document_data.Defenses: The gate was flanked by a pair of guard towers. Furthermore, a pair [[Zhentilar]] guardposts were located just inside the gate.
document_data.Activities: The North Tesh Gate provided access to both the [[Zhentil Keep/Common Quarter|Common Quarter]] and [[Zhentil Keep/Harbor District|Harbor District]] in southeastern Zhentil Keep from the [[Zhentil Keep/Foreign Quarter|Foreign Quarter]] via the Tesh Bridge.
